cause.description:
AAFSC provides ESL classes, youth development programs, citizenship assistance, health access, child welfare protective services, domestic violence prevention and legal services to Arab-Americans from all five boroughs of New York City. We strive to address all cultural and language barriers Arab immigrants face, encourage positive leadership within the community and promote a stronger and more united Arab-American constituency. AAFSC remains a vital and relevant institutional presence for Arab immigrants throughout New York City, not only for the essential services we provide, but also for the voice we have given to this frequently overlooked population.
